instructions: FIDELIS January 9, 2012 at 11:10 pm Hello, you could try the following: -- settings -- mail -- contacts -- calendars -- select email account where your emails are located -- select archive messages I am not sure if this works with every webmail. It works with gmail and google accounts. http://blogmines.com/blog/2011/07/06/how-to-archive-email-messages-in-ipad-2/ Anonymous January 9, 2012 at 6:35 pm http://simpleleapsoftware.com/blog/q-a-where-are-my-archived-iphone-emails/403/ Tap Settings Tap Mail, Contacts, Calendars Tap on your Gmail mail account there should be slider at the bottom that says Archive Mesages ?
